trans-unit.source: Describes the area of the designer that contains the point passed to a <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest(System.Drawing.Point)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Descreve a área do designer que contém o ponto no passado para um método <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest(System.Drawing.Point)" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestLocations> is used by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> methods to describe the area of the designer hit by mouse clicks and drag and drop operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestLocations> é usado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> métodos para descrever a área do designer de acertos por cliques do mouse e operações arrastar e soltar.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestLocations> to decide what kind of action to take in response to a successful hit test.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestLocations> para decidir que tipo de ação a ser executada em resposta a um teste de hit com êxito.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the addition of a new branch using a designer based off of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra a adição de uma nova ramificação de usando um designer com base no logoff de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanInsertActivities%2A> returns `true`, a new branch is created using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanInsertActivities%2A> retorna `true`, uma nova ramificação é criada usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo> object is created as a parameter to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> method using the location of the workflow designer by specifying the Designer flag.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo> será criado como um parâmetro para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> método usando o local do designer de fluxo de trabalho, especificando o sinalizador de Designer.

trans-unit.source: When this is finished, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.EnsureVisibleContainedDesigner%2A> method is used to ensure that the newly added branch is displayed in the workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: Quando isso for concluído, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.EnsureVisibleContainedDesigner%2A> método é usado para garantir que a ramificação recém-adicionado é exibida no designer de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the area contained by the expand button was hit.
trans-unit.target: Indica que a área contida pelo botão de expansão foi atingida.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the bottom of the designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: Indica que a parte inferior do designer foi atingida.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a connector on the designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: Indica que um conector no designer foi atingido.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that any part of the designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: Indica que qualquer parte do designer foi atingida.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the left part of the designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: Indica que a parte esquerda do designer foi atingida.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that no part of the designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: Indica que nenhuma parte do designer foi atingida.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the right part of the designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: Indica que a parte direita do designer foi atingida.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the top of the designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: Indica que a parte superior do designer foi atingida.
